archimate:BusinessFunction.name: BEELDVORMING
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: <languages xml:space="preserve"><nl-NL>Het uitvoeren en verslagleggen van beeldvormend onderzoek zoals radiologie en nucleair.</nl-NL><en-US>These tests provide a picture of the inside of the body—in its entirety or only of certain parts. Ordinary x-rays are the most common imaging tests. Others include ultrasonography, radioisotope (nuclear) scanning, computed tomography (CT), magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), positron emission tomography (PET), and angiography.</en-US></languages>

properties.value: Het uitvoeren en verslagleggen van beeldvormend onderzoek zoals radiologie en nucleair.

These tests provide a picture of the inside of the body—in its entirety or only of certain parts. Ordinary x-rays are the most common imaging tests. Others include ultrasonography, radioisotope (nuclear) scanning, computed tomography (CT), magnetic reson
ance imaging (MRI), positron emission tomography (PET), and angiography.
